code: import React from'react';import{Modal,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CheckoutPopup=_ref=>{let{show,handleClose,cartItems,totalPrice,handleCheckout}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:show,onHide:handleClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Header,{closeButton:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Title,{children:"Checkout"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal.Body,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkout-items",children:[cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkout-item",style:{display:'flex',marginBottom:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.imageUrl,alt:item.name,style:{width:'200px',marginRight:'10px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",item.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",item.price*item.quantity]})]})]},item.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"total",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{children:["Total: $",totalPrice]})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal.Footer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"secondary",onClick:handleClose,children:"Close"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",onClick:handleCheckout,children:"Confirm Purchase"})]})]});};export default CheckoutPopup;
